title: Four metals, three pins and one on chain, displayed over light colored board, on desk with telephone on left, calendar which reads "Wednesday 15 June 1955 Co/ 1-6220", book titled "Pittsburgh Courier Manual of Style Containing Typographical Rules Specimens of Type and Unit Count for Editors Correspondent, Proofreaders, and Printers 1947 Presented by The Pittsburgh Courier Pub Co. 26... Centre Avenue Pittsburgh 19, PA", several papers some which read "Mr. Pennywell.... For City Edition", "Memo from the desk of P.L. Prattis", and a newspaper with headline "Parkway Jewish Center Will Lay Cornerstone"
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
